directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet with cooking spray.
Mix oats, pumpkin puree, sugar, egg white, baking powder, baking soda, and cinnamon together in a bowl. Divide into 2 portions on the greased baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste
title: Pumpkin Oatmeal Cookies for Two
